name: Alfonzas
description:
This game was created as a short personal project. It follows my late Grandfather that had an incredible story to tell. I wanted to attempt visualizing this story in the form of a short game. This game by no means is perfect or even much of a game, although I still had fun making it and I wanted to put it out there for someone else to try. 

There is also a couple easter eggs in the main house ;)

Playtime: No more than 10 minutes long.

Instructions:

  1. Download
  2. Extract
  3. Open Game.exe
  4. Enjoy

Thanks for giving it a try!

- Valdemaras Tomasevicius
